mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Hanlin, Tarlton Patient Age: 22. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture of right leg. Location Wounded: In act[ion] at Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/09/19. Nature of Wound: Conical bullet. Result: Transferred to US General Hospital Philadelphia Pa May 6th 1865.
